name: Daybreak EQ Forums Dark Theme
description: A plain dark gray theme for the everquest forums.
additional_info:
7-9-18 - Added grey borders between headers, forums, dev posts and regular user posts.
7-9-18 - Fixed description color of the guide forum and player studio forum.
7-9-18 - Changed up colors of the quoted post box and the text within it along with removing the background color that sits behind quoted text.
7-9-18 - Fixed color of text of the page numbers on top of the forums so it's easier to read.
7-10-18 - A bunch of visual updates to several areas like post controls and forum controls.
7-12-18 - changed outside divs of the forums to black to help offset some of the grey.
7-28-2018 - Changed up the colors surrounding the forums from black to a darker gray.
